    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentTemperature

        javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.Temperature> getCurrentTemperature()
        Returns:
        The current temperature in the refrigerator.

      • getTargetTemperature

        javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.Temperature> getTargetTemperature()
        Returns:
        The target temperature in the refrigerator. The current temperature should always be lower than the target.

      • getMinimumTemperature

        javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.Temperature> getMinimumTemperature()
        Returns:
        The minimum temperature in the refrigerator

      • getSupercoolMode

        boolean getSupercoolMode()
        Returns:
        true when super cool is currently on, false if not.
